body:
Currently none of the out of box archival providers have ExecutionStatus as visibility column and users have to resort to look at event history to find this out and cannot 
search archived workflows by execution status. 

Ask is to please add ExecutionStatus as one of the exported search attributes for archival

comments.body:
I don't feel the team has the bandwidth to improve the archival feature at this point. We are happy to take a contribution from the community for sure.

Making ExecutionStatus part of the archived visibility records should relative simple, making it an index column will be much harder I think. @tsurdilo is a non-index column good enough here?

title: Add ExecutionStatus to visibility columns for archived executions
